title: FALSE: McDonald’s Parasitic Worm Outbreak Linked Back to Ground “Worm Filler” in Patties
subtitle: Fake news sites utilized an old urban legend for a story linking an outbreak of parasitic worms to the use of "worm filler" in McDonald's hamburger meat.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The CDC linked a parasitic worm outbreak to the use of "worm filler" in McDonald's beef patties.
